page.title: 07Hannington Entertainment
page.content: The Hannington Silver Band was formed 61 years ago in 1924 by Leslie Wythe and his friend George Watts. Two other founder members were Reg & Clem Wythe. It started as a temperance Band for the purpose of accompanying the Meth- odists in church, before they had an organ. Mr Watts died in 1976, and Reg died in 1983, but the other founder members are still active in the Band, along with their families, friends & villagers, who number 25 plus. All re- hearse weekly, still in the Methodist Church. The Band does a great deal of charity work, playing at summer fetes & church services-especially at Christmas time. They have won many competitions, and their uniform of green blazers, crim- son bow-tie & grey trousers are well known in the area.
